## Load libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(sf)
library(terra)
library(tmap)
```

## Read in data
```{r}
# Read in roads data
roads <- st_read(here('data','gis_osm_roads_free_1.gpkg'))

# Read in houses data
houses <- st_read(here('data','gis_osm_buildings_a_free_1.gpkg'))

# Read in socioeconomic data
texas <- st_read(here('data','ACS_2019_5YR_TRACT_48_TEXAS.gdb'), layer = 'ACS_2019_5YR_TRACT_48_TEXAS')

# Read in lights data
lights1 <- rast(here("data/VNP46A1/VNP46A1.A2021038.h08v05.001.2021039064328.tif")) 
lights2 <- rast(here("data/VNP46A1/VNP46A1.A2021038.h08v06.001.2021039064329.tif"))
lights3 <- rast(here("data/VNP46A1/VNP46A1.A2021047.h08v05.001.2021048091106.tif"))
lights4 <- rast(here("data/VNP46A1/VNP46A1.A2021047.h08v06.001.2021048091105.tif"))
```

```{r}
# Preliminary map to ensure data was read in correctly
tm_shape(texas) +
  tm_polygons() +
tm_shape(houses) +
  tm_symbols()
```

```{r}
tm_shape(texas) +
  tm_borders() +
tm_shape(lights1) +
  tm_raster(lights1)
```
